response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at an exclusive price of $14,500. This offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to experience the full value of the product without compromising on cost. I believe this is a fair deal that respects the mutual interest in this transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
